name: Blood Blade
description:
Neon retrofuturistic cyber vampire action!

Control a cyber vampire in a retrofurutistic world of neon lights and defeat electro-priests using your blade and use your enemies' blood to perform various skills.

 Controls: 

Game:
WASD: Move
Mouse: Aim
Left-Click: Attack
Right-Click: Special attack (Gun)
1: Skill - Heal
2: Skill - Clash
3: Skill - GunDev Tools:
9: Reset level
0: Unlock all skills
O: +1 HP
P: +1 Blood

Music: Rocket Jr - Fusion
